interface.name: Filter
interface.javadoc:
A Filter can be used to provide fine grain control over what is logged, beyond the control provided by log levels.

Each Logger and each Handler can have a filter associated with it. The Logger or Handler will call the isLoggable method to check if a given LogRecord should be published. If isLoggable returns false, the LogRecord will be discarded. 1.4

Check if a given log record should be published.
record a LogRecord
true if the log record should be published.
